接口 PropertyGroupModule

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DbPropertyGroupModule, JcrPropertyGroupModule, OKMPropertyGroup

    public interface PropertyGroupModule

    • 方法详细资料

      • addGroup

        void addGroup(java.lang.String token,
            java.lang.String nodePath,
            java.lang.String grpName)
              throws NoSuchGroupException,
                     LockException,
                     PathNotFoundException,
                     AccessDeniedException,
                     RepositoryException,
                     DatabaseException,
                     ExtensionException,
                     AutomationException
        Add a property group to a document.
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The path that identifies an unique node.
        grpName - The group name previously registered in the system.
        抛出:
        NoSuchGroupException - If there is no such registered group name.
        LockException - Can't modify a locked document.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException
        AutomationException

      • removeGroup

        void removeGroup(java.lang.String token,
               java.lang.String nodePath,
               java.lang.String grpName)
                 throws AccessDeniedException,
                        NoSuchGroupException,
                        LockException,
                        PathNotFoundException,
                        RepositoryException,
                        DatabaseException,
                        ExtensionException
        Removes a property group from a document.
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The path that identifies an unique node.
        grpName - The group name previously registered in the system.
        抛出:
        NoSuchGroupException - If there is no such registered group name.
        LockException - Can't modify a locked document.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        AccessDeniedException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException

      • getGroups

        java.util.List<PropertyGroup> getGroups(java.lang.String token,
                                      java.lang.String nodePath)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               ParseException,
                                               PathNotFoundException,
                                               RepositoryException,
                                               DatabaseException
        Get groups assigned to a document.
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The path that identifies an unique node.
        返回:
        A list with all groups assigned to the document.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException
        ParseException
        DatabaseException

      • getAllGroups

        java.util.List<PropertyGroup> getAllGroups(java.lang.String token)
                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                  ParseException,
                                                  RepositoryException,
                                                  DatabaseException
        Get all groups defined in the system.
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        返回:
        A list with all groups registered in the system.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException
        ParseException
        DatabaseException

      • getProperties

        java.util.List<FormElement> getProperties(java.lang.String token,
                                        java.lang.String nodePath,
                                        java.lang.String grpName)
                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                 ParseException,
                                                 NoSuchGroupException,
                                                 PathNotFoundException,
                                                 RepositoryException,
                                                 DatabaseException
        Get all properties defined in a document by group.
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The path that identifies an unique node.
        grpName - The group name previously registered in the system.
        返回:
        A list with all properties defined in the group and its actual values.
        抛出:
        NoSuchGroupException - If there is no such registered group name.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException
        ParseException
        DatabaseException

      • setProperties

        void setProperties(java.lang.String token,
                 java.lang.String nodePath,
                 java.lang.String grpName,
                 java.util.List<FormElement> properties)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          ParseException,
                          NoSuchPropertyException,
                          NoSuchGroupException,
                          LockException,
                          PathNotFoundException,
                          AccessDeniedException,
                          RepositoryException,
                          DatabaseException,
                          ExtensionException,
                          AutomationException
        Set group properties to a document.
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The path that identifies an unique node.
        grpName - The group name previously registered in the system.
        properties - The property values.
        抛出:
        NoSuchPropertyException - If there is no such registered category property.
        NoSuchGroupException - If there is no such registered group name.
        LockException - Can't modify a locked document.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException
        ParseException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException
        AutomationException

      • getPropertyGroupForm

        java.util.List<FormElement> getPropertyGroupForm(java.lang.String token,
                                               java.lang.String grpName)
                                                 throws ParseException,
                                                        java.io.IOException,
                                                        RepositoryException,
                                                        DatabaseException
        Get all possible values which can have a property.
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        grpName - The group name previously registered in the system.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If there is any problem reading the property values.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        ParseException
        DatabaseException

      • hasGroup

        boolean hasGroup(java.lang.String token,
               java.lang.String nodePath,
               java.lang.String grpName)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        ParseException,
                        PathNotFoundException,
                        RepositoryException,
                        DatabaseException
        Test if a node has a property group assigned
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The path that identifies an unique node.
        grpName - The group name previously registered in the system.
        返回:
        True if the document has the given property group assigned, and false otherwise.
        抛出:
        NoSuchGroupException - If there is no such registered group name.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException
        ParseException
        DatabaseException
